message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to what I am willing to pay. How about $12,000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still looking to keep the cost within my budget. Would $14,000 be a feasible compromise?
